title: How to Make Pineapple Coconut Sauce

steps.headline: Combine the sugar, pineapple juice, and butter in a saucepan under medium heat.
steps.description: Stir thoroughly until the sugar has dissolved.

steps.headline: Allow the mixture to come to a boil.
steps.description: Lower the heat and let it simmer for 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Serve the sauce hot or warm over deep fried chicken.

text: Combine the sugar, pineapple juice, and butter in a saucepan under medium heat. Stir thoroughly until the sugar has dissolved. Whisk in the remaining ingredients.  Allow the mixture to come to a boil. Lower the heat and let it simmer for 5 minutes. Serve the sauce hot or warm over deep fried chicken.
